pageProduct.name: Swisse Vitamin C + Zinc Powder Berry 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Don't let cold & flu get in the way of your day. Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Vitamin C + Zinc Powder is a premium quality formula designed to provide everyday support for maintaining a healthy immune system, as well as, relief from common cold symptoms when you're caught off-guard.

Immune Health: Vitamin C and zinc help support immune system health and function.

Common Cold Symptom Relief: Vitamin C helps reduce the duration and severity of common cold symptoms.

Naturally Sweetened: Sweetened with naturally derived monk fruit and stevia.

Size: 150g

Warnings

WARNINGS:

For adult use only. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH DOSAGE (2.5 g) CONTAINS:

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 386 mg
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate) 318 mg
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from sodium ascorbate) 296 mg
Total Vitamin C 1 g
ZINC (from zinc amino acid chelate) 5 mg
ALLERGEN INFORMATION

Contains soya bean and sulfites.
No added lactose, gluten, yeast, artificial colours or flavours

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

Mix 0.5 level metric teaspoon (2.5 g) with 250 mL of water. Consume once daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

STORAGE:

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Powder may settle prior to opening. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
